name: Travis Clark
title: Pitching Coach
bio: 8 years of pitching coaching experience specializing in development and rehabilitation. Trained over 500 pitchers and successfully rehabbed 70+ UCL and labrum tears. 35 players committed to colleges in the past 24 months. Expert in efficient movement patterns to maximize velocity and pitch design.

name: Nick Gooden
title: Hitting Coach
bio: Six years of Division 1 playing experience at Morehead State, where he earned a Gold Glove Award in the 2024 season. Focused on developing the physical and mental aspects of hitting and defense.

name: Gavin Sunderman
title: Pitching Coach
bio: Former collegiate baseball player at Wabash Valley College. Dedicated to helping throwers develop a strong physical and mental foundation for long-term arm health and performance.

name: Marc Carney
title: Strength Coach
bio: Played collegiate baseball at Central Michigan University and the University of Cincinnati. Committed to helping athletes excel in the mental, physical, and skill-based aspects of the game.

name: Braden Pickett
title: Rehab & Arm Care Coach
bio: Former collegiate athlete focused on empowering athletes to reach their full potential â€” physically, mentally, and emotionally. Specializes in return-to-play programs and arm care.
